08-29-2024: - Added new T3 Weapon Item, {{ItemIcon|Item=Headhunter|Size=20}} Headhunter: Requires {{ItemIcon|Item=High-Velocity Mag|Size=20}} High-Velocity Mag. Passive cooldown: Landing a headshot on heroes deals bonus +140 Damage, heals you for +8% Max HP and grants +2 m/s for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 6 seconds.
